amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 114-290 to require the Secretary of the Energy to complete a study on the net greenhouse gas emissions that will result from the repeal of the crude oil export ban.
amendment.purpose: Amendment requires the Secretary of Energy to complete a study on the net greenhouse gas emissions that will result from the repeal of the crude oil export ban.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Huffman.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
